titleStmt.title: At the court at Whitehall, the thirteenth of October 1680. Present, the Kings most excellent Majesty, His Highness Prince Rupert ... [17 others] Mr. Godolphin. : His Majesty being informed, that notwithstanding his late proclamation of the fourth of this instant October, commanding all Papists, or reputed Papists, to depart from the cities of London and Westminster ...

notesStmt.note: Reward for the discovery of Papists in London.--Steele.
